description:
Performance fit for a full day of powder turns. Fine-gauge merino wool provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.

  • Made of high-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit
  • All weather performance: Warm in winter, cool enough for spring turns
  • True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • High-density cushioning underfoot for comfort in ski boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Snowpack Midweight with Cushion OTC Socks - Unisex
